member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter has classes related to query filters. It has classes: ExpressionVisitor class: used to visit the different types of expressions, QueryService class: used to execute the IDS queries and return appropriate responses, StringExtensions class: has extension methods for string data type.

member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.Properties.Resources.CommunicationErrorMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There was an error while communicating with the Ids Server..

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.Properties.Resources.ExceptionGeneratedMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Exception has been generated: {0}..

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.Properties.Resources.ResponseStreamNullOrEmptyMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Response Stream was null or empty..

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.QueryService`1.ExecuteIdsQuery(System.String,Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.QueryOperationType)
member.summary: Executes the Ids Query and returns the response.
member.param: The string representation of ids query.
Query Operation Type. Default value is query.
member.returns: ReadOnly Collection fo items of type T.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.QueryService`1.ExecuteMultipleEntityQueries``1(System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection{System.String})
member.summary: Entity Service supports multiple queries within a request. Use this method to perform multiple entity query operation.
member.param: The simple query language string collection.
member.returns: Returns a collection of entities for individual simple query.
member.exception: If the parameter is null or empty or exceeds a maximum of five(5) queries.
If the query syntax is incorrect.
If there were serialization issues with the response from the service.
When service returned with an error information.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.QueryService`1.StringValueOf(System.Enum)
member.summary: Returns the XmlEnumAttribute name if present else returns the enum object. Add any specific types in switch case if needed in future

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.QueryService`1.GetIdsDateTimeFormat(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the string value of the date time if the parameter is of type datetime.
member.returns: String if conversion was successful or else the value itself.

member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.StringExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for the string data type.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.StringExtensions.In(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Determines whether a sequence contains a specified element by using the default equality comparer.
member.param: A sequence in which to locate a value.
The value to locate in the sequence.
member.returns: True if the source sequence contains an element that has the specified value otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.QueryFilter.StringExtensions.RemoveWhiteSpaces(System.String)
member.summary: Removes unwanted whitespaces from the string.
member.param: The value to remove the whitespaces from.
member.returns: String with single whitespace between elements.
